014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.reflect.Method;
018import java.lang.reflect.Parameter;
019import java.lang.reflect.Type;
020
021import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.QueryTimeOut;
022import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementCustomizer;
023import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementCustomizerFactory;
024import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.customizer.SqlStatementParameterCustomizer;
025
026public class QueryTimeOutFactory implements SqlStatementCustomizerFactory {
027    @Override
028    public SqlStatementCustomizer createForType(Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType) {
029        int queryTimeout = ((QueryTimeOut) annotation).value();
030        return stmt -> stmt.setQueryTimeout(queryTimeout);
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public SqlStatementCustomizer createForMethod(Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
035        return createForType(annotation, sqlObjectType);
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public SqlStatementParameterCustomizer createForParameter(Annotation annotation,
040                                                              Class<?> sqlObjectType,
041                                                              Method method,
042                                                              Parameter param,
043                                                              int index,
044                                                              Type type) {
045        return (stmt, queryTimeout) -> stmt.setQueryTimeout((Integer) queryTimeout);
046    }
047}
